description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. "Ninjya Chop" is a Ninja Training to chop off milk bottles.   During training, you will sometime get a new costume as a  reward. So try it out when you get it.   Keep chop!  * Zombie Mode Addition !!
